briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study of DU-176b, Prevention of Venous Thromboembolism in Patients After Total Knee Arthroplasty
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-Blind, Double-Dummy Efficacy and Safety Study of the Oral Factor Xa Inhibitor DU-176b Compared With Enoxaparin Sodium for Prevention of Venous Thromboembolism in Patients After Total Knee Arthroplasty (STARS E-3 Trial)
summary: The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of DU-176b compared with enoxaparin sodium for the prevention of venous thromboembolism in patients after elective total knee arthroplasty.

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Subjects With Venous Thromboembolism Events.
